product_name: Ben's Insect Repellent Wipes - 30 Percent DEET - Package of 12
long_description: You'll enjoy the outdoors more this summer if you're not swatting ticks and mosquitoes; Ben's 30% DEET Formula Insect Repellent Wipes save the day! DEET (N, N-dimethyl-m-toluamide) is the most effective insect repellent available. Active ingredient 30% DEET offers up to 8 hours of protection against mosquitoes, ticks, flies, chiggers, fleas and no-see-ums. Effectively repels insects that may carry West Nile Virus and Lyme Disease. Each wipe is individually wrapped, allowing you to take it anywhere you might encounter biting insects.
short_description: You'll enjoy the outdoors more this summer if you're not swatting ticks and mosquitoes; Ben's 30% DEET Formula Insect Repellent Wipes save the day!
